Windows tablets- a "slew of them"- will be unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer at the 2011 Consumer Electronics Show, according to an article today in the New York Times. Citing people familiar with Microsoft's plans, the Times reports that several manufacturers have signed up to build Windows tablets, including Dell and Samsung. that Mike Pence has represented since 2000, but he also has speeches planned at Republican Party events as far from his Columbus home base as Lake County.
